Visible.description: Only valid for static section, will be ignored in dynamic sections.

enum.description: An information icon and a disclosure (chevron) control on iOS and web. An information icon only on Android.
A chevron-shaped control for presenting new content on iOS and web. Display as blank on Android.

AccessoryType.description: Optional accessory icon to be displayed in the cell. If both `AccessoryType` and `ProgressIndicator` are set, only the `ProgressIndicator` is shown.

KeyName.description: The key name of the cell.

OnPress.description: Action/Rule to be triggered when the cell is pressed.

KeyName.description: The string value is a style class name of `KeyName`.

Value.description: The string value is a style class name of `Value`.
